content: this is a crochet hat pattern for a perfectly slouchy beanie with a giant pompom i have named this hat the ballintoy after the picturesque village of ballintoy near my place of birth in northern ireland it is famous for its remarkable scenery and beautifully situated fishing harbor such an exposed location often requires a warm hat which is precisely what this pattern will give you this is a super slouchy hat sized for women head circumference 22-23 inches you will need bulky weight yarn to complete this project the pattern is suitable for beginners with a basic crocheting knowledge and is written in standard us terms i have included detailed step-by-step instructions and i also offer free support via email should you need help with any aspect of the making process if you have any questions whatsoever do feel free to contact me weeyarnstudio @ gmail com also i d love to see your wee yarn creations so tag me using #weeyarndiy on social media and spread the handmade goodness blessings melanie ---- this pattern is entirely my own work and is the result of many hours of labor on my part as you will appreciate it is therefore covered by international copyright law which means that it cannot be copied altered reproduced distributed sold or recorded in any part or whole or in any shape or form products created using this pattern however may be sold in small quantities but please give credit to melanie thomassian at www weeyarn com my pattern and photographs may not be used for resale purposes
